list.abs: 长叶海带(Laminaria longissima)、极北海带(Laminaria hyperborean)的线粒体全序列,结合公共数据库中海带属线粒体DNA(mitochondrion DNA,mtDNA)数据,探讨海带属线粒体DNA.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin hyperboreanus, from Greek huperboreos, from huper 'beyond' + boreas 'north wind'

means.word_mean: 1. (Greek mythology) one of a people that the ancient Greeks believed lived in a warm and sunny land north of the source of the north wind
